name: Elden Ring - Standard Edition (PS4)
description: Elden Ring is an action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was directed by Hidetaka Miyazaki and had a world designed by George R. R. Martin. The game rose to prominence for its cooperative multiplayer, gameplay mechanics, and rich worldbuilding. Master its combat mechanics, traverse the Lands Between, and discover the Elden Beast.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (Xbox Series X)
description: Experience the ultimate military shooter on next-gen. Black Ops 6 features explosive campaign action, cutting-edge multiplayer, and intense zombies mode. Join the fight across stunning environments with 4K resolution and 120fps gameplay.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Console (Disc Edition)
description: Ultra High-Speed SSD load times, stunning 4K gaming performance, immersive 3D audio, and revolutionary haptic feedback and adaptive trigger technology. Play exclusive titles like God of War, Spider-Man, and more.

name: Xbox Series X Console
description: The world's most powerful gaming console with 4K/120fps gaming, Quick Resume feature, and Game Pass Ultimate access. Experience massive performance leap with 12 teraflops of processing power.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom (Nintendo Switch)
description: The long-awaited sequel to The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. Embark on an epic adventure in the vast open world of Hyrule. Use Link's new Fused Powers to combat puzzles and enemies, and discover secrets throughout the kingdom.

name: DualSense Wireless Controller - Galactic Purple
description: Experience next-gen gaming with the DualSense controller. Features haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, built-in microphone, and advanced vibration technology. Compatible with PS5 and select PC titles.

name: HyperX Cloud Stinger 2 Gaming Headset
description: Professional-grade gaming headset with 7.1 virtual surround sound, memory foam ear cushions, and 90-degree rotating microphone. Works with PC, PS5, Xbox Series X, and Nintendo Switch.

name: Hogwarts Legacy (PC - Steam CD Key)
description: Immerse yourself in the Wizarding World as a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Experience magic like never before in this immersive action RPG set in the 1800s.

name: Logitech Pro X Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: Tournament-grade mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches, LIGHTSYNC RGB customization, and premium build quality. Perfect for competitive gaming and typing.

name: Nintendo Switch - OLED Model
description: Features a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, a wide adjustable stand, a dock with a wired LAN port, 64 GB of internal storage, and enhanced audio.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 (PS5)
description: Spider-Men, Peter Parker and Miles Morales, return for an exciting new adventure in the critically acclaimed Marvel's Spider-Man franchise for PS5.

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth (PS5)
description: The second game in the Final Fantasy VII remake project, continuing the story of Cloud Strife and his allies.

name: Starfield (Xbox Series X)
description: Create any character you want and explore with unparalleled freedom as you embark on an epic journey to answer humanity's greatest mystery.

name: Forza Motorsport (Xbox Series X)
description: Race over 500 real-world cars including modern race cars and cutting-edge prototypes in the most realistic racing experience ever.

name: Super Mario Bros. Wonder (Nintendo Switch)
description: Classic Mario side-scrolling gameplay is turned on its head with the addition of Wonder Flowers. These game-changing items trigger spectacular moments you have to see to believe.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty (PC - GOG Key)
description: Return as cyber-enhanced mercenary V and embark on a high-stakes mission of espionage and intrigue to save the NUSA President.

name: Baldur's Gate 3 (PC - Steam CD Key)
description: Gather your party and return to the Forgotten Realms in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, sacrifice and survival, and the lure of absolute power.

name: Xbox Elite Series 2 Wireless Controller
description: Experience the Xbox Elite Wireless Controller Series 2 featuring adjustable-tension thumbsticks, wrap-around rubberized grip, and shorter hair trigger locks.

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless Headset
description: Almighty Audio has never been more accessible. Vibe with your favorite gaming world and score with your friends. Dive deeper with the superior audio quality from the most-awarded headset makers.

name: PlayStation Plus - 12-Month Subscription
description: Enhance your PlayStation experience with online multiplayer, monthly games, exclusive discounts and more.

name: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate - 3-Month Subscription
description: Get all the benefits of Xbox Live Gold, plus over 100 high-quality console and PC games. With games added all the time, there's always something new to play.
